_schema: Profile information - edit this to update personal details

profile.name: Fardin Iqbal
profile.tagline: I craft elegant software from the ground up
bio: Computer Science @ Stony Brook University. Building everything from memory allocators in C to full-stack web apps. Currently exploring the intersection of AI and software engineering.

I specialize in full-stack web development, with experience spanning from low-level systems programming in C to modern web frameworks like React and Ruby on Rails. I enjoy working across the entire stack and am always eager to learn new technologies.
When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new tech, contributing to open-source projects, or diving into research at the intersection of AI and software engineering.
